content: Can you provide a succinct explanation for how one can embody unwavering determination and positivity in times of hardship without resorting to the cliche "It is what it is"? In addition, can you introduce a new requirement that involves incorporating the concept of "grit" into this approach? Also, could you furnish a brief Go code example that demonstrates how this mindset can be utilized to uplift one's spirits in the face of adversity?
